sentences.sContent: After the movie was finished, my husband reminded me that I am an Annie Sullivan.
sentences.sCn: 看完电影后，我丈夫提醒我说，我就是一个安妮·莎莉文式的人。

sentences.sContent: Dear Annie: I hope you and your readers have some suggestions for me, because I'm just about at the end of my rope.
sentences.sCn: 亲爱的安妮： 我希望您和您的读者可以给我提些建议，因为我实在是山穷水尽，毫无办法了。
